title: Richy_T
author: Richy_T
content: So I just stumbled across my deets I used for the Ripple giveaway from way back when...https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=145506.0Thing is, their wallet link is now 404https://ripple.com/clientAnyone know how I can get access to these coins or is this just yet another reason to hate on Ripple?
